channel.title: How to fix your client
channel.description: when u hit enter on the user name and password section it says err connecting to server how i fix that??

item.title: How to fix your client
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

You REALLY need to specify. First of all, it might not be client sided.
have you tried:

[ul][li]Changing the IP?[/li]
[li]Making sure your server/source file is running?[/li]
[li]Making sure there are no errors popping up when the source is running?[/li]
[li]Making sure you are typing in the right log-in information?[/li][/ul]

Read full topic
